results.name: Expansion of x*(1 - 2*x + x^2 + 7*x^3 - x^4)/((1 - x)^4*(1 + x)^3).
comment: The n-th generalized n-gonal number (for n >= 5).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index to sequences related to polygonal numbers
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,3,-3,-3,3,1,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x (1 - 2 x + x^2 + 7 x^3 - x^4)/((1 - x)^4 (1 + x)^3), {x, 0, 50}], x]
Table[SeriesCoefficient[x (1 + (n - 4) x + x^2)/((1 - x)^3 (1 + x)^2), {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 50}]
